Song.title: That's Why We Praise Him
Song.copyright: Tommy Walker/Â© 1999 Doulos Publishing (Admin. by Maranatha! Music)

Arrangement.text:
Intro:
[C G F C G F]
Verse 1 He came to [C G]live live a [F]perfect life He came to [C G]be the living [F]word our light He came to [C G]die so we'd be [F]reconciled He came to [C G]rise to show His [F]pow'r [G/F]and [F G]might
Chorus 1 [C]That's why we [G]praise Him [F]that's why we [G]sing [C]That's why we [G]offer Him our [F G/F]ev'ry[F G]thing [C]That's why we [G]bow down and [F]worship this King 'Cause He [Dm]gave [C/E]His [F]ev'[G]ry[Am7 Am7/G]thing 'Cause He [Dm7]gave [C/E]His [F]ev'[G]ry [C]thing [G F]
Verse 2 He came to [C G]live live a[F]gain in us He came to [C G]be our conquering [F]King and friend He came to [C G]heal and show the [F]lost ones His love He came to [C G]go prepare a [F]place [G/F]for [F G]us
Repeat Chorus:
(BRIDGE)
[C]Hal[G]le [F]hallelu[G]jah [C]Hal[G]le [F]hallelu[G]jah
Repeat Chorus:
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 he came to live live a perfect life he came to be the living word our light he came to die so wed be reconciled he came to rise to show his powr and might chorus 1 thats why we praise him thats why we sing thats why we offer him our evrything thats why we bow down and worship this king cause he gave his evrything cause he gave his evry thing verse 2 he came to live live again in us he came to be our conquering king and friend he came to heal and show the lost ones his love he came to go prepare a place for us repeat chorus bridge halle hallelujah halle hallelujah repeat chorus
